review_data.title: I like it there!
review_data.content: good food, nice service and nice wine, cheese and other specialitys. I like the menus for lunch and the croque monsieur is a highlight.

review_data.title: ok
review_data.content: finde eigentlich nur die menus gut und die eine Mitarbeiterin hat mir sicher schon 3 mal zu wenig Retourgeld gegeben.

review_data.title: Fresh salads, sandwiches, quiche
review_data.content: Close to my office, I go maybe once a week. Each week they have a selection of fresh salads, different quiches daily, and a weekly hot dish. Reasonably priced. Also is a traiteur so you will find wines, cheeses and other items for sale.

review_data.title: Excellente Salate und Baguettes
review_data.content: Eigentlich eine Weinhandlung, offeriert La Bastide deliziöse Salate und Baguettes zu günstigen Preisen. Die Produkte sind immer frisch und hervorragend...More

review_data.title: Qual der Wahl ...
review_data.content: Beste Sandwiches in town! Ideale Verpflegung zum Mitnehmen auf Uetlibergspaziergang über Mittag! Immer frisch und knusprig.

review_data.title: Salads are delicious and very attractive price
review_data.content: It's a take-away place, where you have a table or two to eat. But in the best case, you don't eat there. They have lots of choices for the salads and you can have several sizes. I go there regulary, but sometimes there are lots...More

review_data.title: A rare and quick taste of France
review_data.content: La Bastide is another of those surprising and hidden places that get known by word-to-mouth. The location doesn't help, as it's set in the middle of a mini-industrial zone, itself in an office neighbourhood, what's more quite removed from the Centre. Nevermind, La Bastide is...More
